name: Kobe Venomenon QS
description:
Nike Kobe Venomenon QS


Return Policy 
At RareAirLA.com, we offer FREE RETURNS on almost every item we carry, so there's no risk. If, for any reason, you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, we will gladly accept your return for an exchange or refund within 30 days of the delivery date. And if your item(s) is eligible, we'll also issue you a FREE return label. Just follow these simple guidelines:

1. Returned items must be in new condition.

RareAirLA.com will not accept returns/exchanges if there is evidence that your purchase has been worn outdoors. Please try on sneakers on a carpeted surface to ensure fit. We will gladly provide a refund/exchange if you are not satisfied.

2. The original shoebox/packaging and all accessories must be returned with your purchase.

Please pack sneakers, shoebox, and all accessories inside original shipping box. Returns without the original shoebox, using the shoebox as a shipping box, or missing accessories will not be accepted.

3. You must have a return authorization number for ALL returns and exchanges.

4. Defective products will be accepted for exchange only.

RareAirLA.com will only exchange defective products within 30 days of the delivery date. After 30 days, the damage will be considered normal wear and tear.

name: NIKE LEBRON XI “MIAMI HEAT”
description: The LeBron 11 Men's Basketball Shoe has been honed to near perfection. Now with less outsole rubber and a new layer of Lunarlon cushioning, it's gotten leaner without losing strength and lower without sacrificing cushioning.

name: Adidas Jeremy Scott Wings 2.0 Pixel
description:
Adidas Jeremy Scott Wings 2.0 Pixel

This new rendition of Adidas Jeremy Scott Wings 2.0 has a "pixelated" design with Soctt's signature wings. Using a classic Adidas basketball silhouette as the base, they also feature a leather upper, lace-up front, Adidas Trefoil logo on the tongue/heel, and a rubber outsole.

description:

Air Jordan IV Retro Basketball Shoes

*LIMIT 1 PAIR PER CUSTOMER.
Our Price: $149.99


Sizes: Please use the drop bar to check for all sizes available,

Condition: Brand new in box. Deadstock.

Payment: We only accept Paypal payments. No trades or offers will be accepted. Payments must be made immediately. Shipments are made only to the address on file with Paypal you use. Please make any corrections to your address prior to payment. Address corrections will not be made under any circumstances.

Authenticity: All of our products are 100% authentic or your money back guaranteed!

Shipping for Domestic U.S Buyers: All orders over $300.00 will be shipped for FREE with USPS Priority mail shipping w/ a delivery confirmation. Any order that exceeds $300.00 will require a signature confirmation. Shipments occur Monday - Saturday within 24 hours of payment received from a confirmed Paypal address. Purchases made on a weekend or holiday will ship out on the next business day.

Shipping for International Buyers: The price of international shipping will be determined by the weight, box size, and location of where the item needs to be sent. Shipping costs will be automatically calculated as you check out. Shipments occur Monday - Saturday within 24 hours of payment received from a confirmed Paypal address. Purchases made on a weekend or holiday will ship out on the next business day.

Returns & Exchange: We do not accept returns. Please make sure that you purchase the correct size and product. We are not responsible for Nike imperfections.

Thanks for shopping with us!
